Class
Description
AddPaddleStrategy
Class for AddPaddleStrategy - Inherits from CollisionStrategy and as an extra creates a MockPaddle in the middle of the screen.
Ball
 
BallCollisionCountdownAgent
BallCollisionCountdownAgent class - manages the ball countdown of 4 collisions and decides if the camera effect should stop.
Brick
Class Brick - responsible for managing the brick instances in the game - called when need to be created or removed.
BrickerGameManager
Class BrickerGameManager manages
BrickStrategyFactory
class BrickStrategyFactory - Responsible for building different Brick Strategies from a variety of 6 types: [CollisionStrategy, AddPaddleStrategy, ChangeCameraStrategy, PuckStrategy, GetExtraLifeStrategy, DoubleDownStrategy]
ChangeCameraStrategy
ChangeCameraStrategy class - responsible for ChangeCameraStrategy kind of Brick CollisionStrategy which focuses the camera on the Ball when hitting a brick with this type of Strategy.
CollisionStrategy
Class CollisionStrategy responsible for brick strategy when a collision with a ball occurs.
DoubleDownStrategy
DoubleDownStrategy class - This class describes a kind of strategy that inherits from CollisionStrategy.
ExtraLife
 
GetExtraLifeStrategy
GetExtraLifeStrategy class - responsible for GetExtraLifeStrategy inherits of Brick CollisionStrategy.
GraphicLifeCounter
Class of GraphicLifeCounter represents a visual indication of life remaining for the user in the Bricker Game.

Class MockPaddle -
MockPaddleCollisionCountdownAgent
MockPaddleCollisionCountdownAgent class - manages the MockPaddle countdown of 3 collisions with other objects and decides if the MockPaddle should disappear.
